text: Cabo da Ribeira is a settlement in the eastern part of the island of Santo Antão, Cape Verde. In 2010 its population was 912. It is situated at about 500 m elevation in the upper valley of the Ribeira do Paul, 5 km southwest of Pombas. It is part of the municipality of Paul, and lies in the Cova-Paul- Ribeira da Torre Natural Park. ==See also== *List of villages and settlements in Cape Verde ==References== Category:Villages and settlements in Santo Antão, Cape Verde Category:Paul, Cape Verde Category:Cova-Paul-Ribeira da Torre Natural Park
title: Cabo da Ribeira
